name: Cultist
desc: Once your team loses 50% of their Health, Galio is summoned, slamming into the largest cluster of enemies and knocking them up. Galio's strength increases based on the total star level of all active Cultists.

name: Divine
desc: Upon attacking 6 times or dropping below 50% Health, Divine champions remove all crowd control and ascend, taking 45% reduced damage and dealing 45% bonus true damage for the duration.

name: Duelist
desc: Innate: Duelists gain bonus Movement Speed. Duelists' attacks grant Attack Speed, up to 8 stacks.

name: Dusk
desc: Dusk champions increase all allies' Spell Power.
stats: And Dusk Champions gain an additional 50%
40% Spell Power for all, and an extra 70% for Dusk Champions

name: Fortune
stats: Winning combat against a player will give bonus orbs. The longer you've gone without an orb, the bigger the payout!
Wins give an extra bonus orb with rare loot.

name: Hunter
desc: Every few seconds, all Hunters will attack the lowest percent Health enemy, dealing bonus damage.

name: Keeper
desc: At the start of combat, Keepers grant themselves and all nearby allies a shield for a duration. This shield is 50% stronger on Keepers.

name: Moonlight
desc: At the start of combat, a number of Moonlight Champions star up once until combat ends. (Prioritizes the lowest star-level champions. If tied, champions with the most items are chosen.)

name: Adept
desc: Adepts calm the flow of battle, reducing the Attack Speed of all enemies by 50% for a few seconds at the start of combat.

name: Assassin
desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the enemy backline. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance, and their spells can critically strike.
stats: +30% Critical Strike Damage & +10% Critical Strike Chance
+60% Critical Strike Damage & +25% Critical Strike Chance
+90% Critical Strike Damage & +40% Critical Strike Chance

name: Brawler
desc: Brawlers gain bonus Health.

name: Dazzler
desc: Dazzlers' spells reduce the Attack Damage of enemies hit for 8 seconds.

name: Elderwood
desc: Every two seconds all Elderwood champions grow, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to five times.
stats: 20 Armor and MR, 5 AD and SP
30 Armor and MR, 10 AD and SP
40 Armor and MR, 20 AD and SP

name: Enlightened
desc: Enlightened champions generate more Mana.

name: Exile
desc: If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain:
stats: A shield equal to 50% of their maximum health

name: Mage
desc: Mages cast twice and have modified Spell Power.

name: Mystic
desc: All allies gain Magic Resistance.

name: Ninja
desc: Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power. This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

name: Shade
desc: Innate: When combat starts, Shades teleport to the enemy backline. After every 3 attacks Shades dip into the shadows, stealthing and causing their next basic attack to deal bonus magic damage.

name: Spirit
desc: The first time a Spirit casts their spell, all allies gain Attack Speed based on the spell's mana cost.

name: Vanguard
desc: Vanguard champions gain bonus Armor.

name: Sharpshooter
desc: Sharpshooters attacks and spells ricochet to nearby enemies dealing reduced damage.

name: Warlord
desc: Warlords have bonus Health and Spell Power. Each victorious combat they participate in increases the bonus by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.
